name: Genesis Inline
author: Ron Rennick

sections.description:
Genesis Inline is designed to work with any Genesis child theme. It provides a front end post entry/edit area for new posts which includes support for

  • post formats (if registered by the child theme)
  • category dropdown
  • tag suggest
  • save draft
  • inline preview on save

The post entry box only show on the homepage of the site for logged in users with a contributor role or greater.

Requires Genesis 1.7.1 or greater. If used with GenesisConnect & BuddyPress, requires GenesisConnect 1.1 and BuddyPress 1.5 or greater.

This plugin is currently in beta.

short_description: An inline front page post editor for Genesis. Works with GenesisConnect & BuddyPress.

screenshots.caption: Genesis Inline with Lifestyle, post formats, GenesisConnect & BuddyPress, tag suggest and inline preview.
